description: Try our easy to follow Florentine Chicken with Warm Tomato Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Florentine Chicken with Warm Tomato Salsa
name: Florentine Chicken with Warm Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes and onion to pan. Toss for 1 minute to warm. Slice chicken and serve with remaining spinach and salsa.
